name: AMANA
description:
Welcome to AMANA, a world filled with creatures who speak a language different from your own. Explore this unfamiliar land and learn about the various Desires of the beings you run into.

This game is a submission for the Bitter Jam 2020 and also my first jam working solo (and my second jam overall). I was heavily inspired by open-exploration games like Yume Nikki, and working on this project gave me a greater appreciation for their artistic decisions. I hope you enjoy!!

AMANA Game Credits

How to Play

  • Arrow Keys - Move around the screen.
  • Enter / Space Bar - Interact with creatures and objects.
  • Shift - Allows you to walk faster while moving.

If you get stuck at any point, feel free to consult the AMANA Full Walkthrough.
